name: nodcam
description: Access and stream web camera in nodejs using ffmpeg, websockets and HTML5.

scripts.ffmpeg: ffmpeg -f dshow -s 1920x1080 -i video="HDR Camera" -movflags faststart -framerate 15 -vcodec mpeg1video -preset veryfast -maxrate 3000k -bufsize 8000k -c:a aac -b:a 160k -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -f mpeg1video http://localhost:8082/12345/1920/1080

author: Taha Ä°PEK
